structure.unit: ARTICLE H. - RENTAL DWELLING REGISTRATION AND PROP NOTIFICATION

law.text: Any person who files an appeal shall pay an administrative fee of two hundred ($200.00) to the City at the time the appeal request is made. Failure to pay the administrative fee shall cause the appeal to be denied. The person who filed the appeal shall be responsible for paying one-half of the costs of the arbitration fee. If the person who appeals is the prevailing party, the administrative fee and the portion of the arbitration fee shall be reimbursed. (Ord. No. 2008-415B, ยง1, 7-1-08)
